段: 要吃生魚在港墘，要討客兄在厝邊；來來去去可相見，較好雲開見著天。
Beh chiah8-sinn hi5 chai7 kang2 kinn5, beh tho2 khe3-hiann chai7 chhu3-pinn; lai5-lai5 khi3-khi3 thang sann-kinn3, khah ho2 hun5 khui kinn3 tioh8 thinn.
日本起山五萬兵，遇著□□做頭前，娘花要歹想心行，無想早前半點情。
Jit8-pun2 khi2 soann gou7 ban7 peng, gu7 tioh8 □□ cho3 thau5-cheng5, niu5-hoe beh phainn2 siunn7 sim-heng7, bo5 siunn7 cha2-cheng5 poann3-tiam2 cheng5.
水錦開花白絲絲，仙人開藥亦難醫，我今只病必定死，沒知阮嫂么主意？
Chui2-gim2 khui-hoe peh8-si-si, sian-lang5 khui-ioh8 iah8 lan5 i, goa2 tann chit pinn7 pit-teng7 si2, m7 chai gun2 so2 mih chu2-i3 ?
阮厝站在娘厝後，不時看娘在探頭，情意總有九分九，路邊相遇頭交交。
Gun2 chhu3 tiam3 ti7 niu5 chhu3-au7, put-si5 khoann3 niu5 tih tham3-thau5, cheng5-i3 chong2 u7 kau2 hun kau2, lou7-pinn sio-tng7 thau5 kau-kau.
暝日思想魂兆兆，想要出聲吞落喉，空空相對若啞口，滿腹情話積住住。
Mi5-jit8 su-siunn2 hun5 tiau7-tiau7, siunn7 beh chhut-siann thun loh8 au5, khang-khang siong-tui3 na2 e2-kau2, moa2-pak cheng5-oe7 chek tiau5-tiau .
